refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.para: ctrlproxy-admin is a simple command-line tool for managing a ctrlproxy instance. It accepts the same syntax as the "admin" network in ctrlproxy.

refsect1.title: OPTIONS
refsect1.para: ctrlproxy-admin recognizes the following command-line options

listitem.para: Read configuration files from the specified directory DIR instead of from .ctrlproxy in the users' homedirectory.
Show help message with short argument information
